name: Throw da Phone
description:
Have you ever been mad while using your phone?

Has somebody sent you an annoying message or a weird photo?
Did you misspell something?

This is dangerous!

But fear no more! Now you can release your anger without getting your precious real phone in trouble.

With Throw Da Phone, you can effortlessly throw around your virtual phone.

Get the highest score and show it to your friends and family!
